channel.title: CVE Feed for mIRC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mIRC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2011-5282|2024-08-07T00:30:46.930Z -- mirc -- mirc
item.description: mIRC prior to 7.22 has a message leak because chopping of outbound messages is mishandled.

item.title: CVE-2008-7314|2024-08-07T12:03:36.319Z -- mirc -- mirc
item.description: mIRC before 6.35 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a long nickname.
